tickets.title: Login Authentication Error
tickets.description: User unable to log in via OAuth. Receives a 403 Forbidden error after selecting account.

tickets.title: Slow Dashboard Loading
tickets.description: The main analytics dashboard takes over 10 seconds to render for users with large datasets.

tickets.title: Billing Statement Discrepancy
tickets.description: Invoice #8842 shows a double charge for the premium subscription tier.

tickets.title: Mobile App Crash on iOS 17
tickets.description: App crashes immediately upon launch on iPhone 15 Pro models running iOS 17.2.

tickets.title: Update Documentation for API v2
tickets.description: The current documentation lacks examples for the new /webhooks endpoint.

tickets.title: Password Reset Link Not Sent
tickets.description: Customers reporting they are not receiving the automated password reset emails.

tickets.title: Feature Request: Dark Mode
tickets.description: Requesting a native dark mode theme for the web portal to reduce eye strain.

tickets.title: Database Connection Timeout
tickets.description: Intermittent connection drops occurring during peak hours (2 PM - 4 PM EST).

tickets.title: Broken Image Links in Newsletter
tickets.description: The images in the December marketing newsletter are not loading (404 errors).

tickets.title: Bulk User Upload Failure
tickets.description: CSV upload fails when attempting to import more than 50 users at once.

tickets.title: Typo in Privacy Policy
tickets.description: There is a spelling error in the third paragraph of the legal privacy statement.

tickets.title: Integrations Page Not Responding
tickets.description: Clicking the 'Settings > Integrations' tab results in a white screen.
